thread.title: Van Gaal a “happy coach” in post Everton victory interviews (videos)
thread.title_full: Van Gaal a “happy coach” in post Everton victory interviews (videos)

author: paulmbanks
title: Van Gaal a “happy coach” in post Everton victory interviews (videos)
text:
Tweet Manchester United Manager Louis van Gaal is delighted with his side’s reaction and response today on the heels of last week’s rout at Arsenal. As thoroughly beaten as United were last week, they were just as impressive this week in defeating Everton handily, by a score of 3-0 at Goodison Park. Van Gaal is a “happy coach,” as very well should be. 
Here is the YouTube of the Louis van Gaal post match interview embedded below: 
And below you’ll find the YouTube of the Louis van Gaal post match press conference. United remain in third place. 
They are tied with Arsenal in points (19), but the Gunners are up on United in goal differential by two. 
Next Sunday will be a monster of a Manchester Derby. 
They’ll host table topping Manchester City, who will be without Sergio Aguero, and quite possibly without David Silva as well. Maybe Van Gaal will be a happy coach again after that contest? 
Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. 
Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
